creator: Google LLC
descriptionHtml:
The Google Ads app helps you manage, optimise and track your ad campaigns using your Android smartphone. You can easily view your ads’ performance on the go with this simplified companion to your desktop account. So you’ll keep your campaigns running smoothly – no matter where your business takes you.
REACH NEW USERS AND GROW YOUR BUSINESS REVENUE
● Create ads and campaigns to drive sales and reach new online customers
● Call a Google marketing expert for live help
● Update your bids, budgets and campaign status
● Add, edit or remove keywords
TRACK YOUR CAMPAIGN PERFORMANCE
● Monitor performance with real-time notifications
● View campaign stats like clicks, impressions, average CPC and conversions
● Act on suggestions, alerts and insights to improve your campaigns
Ready to start advertising with Google? Download the app to get started.
descriptionShort: Manage your Google Ads performance on the go.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We regularly update the Google Ads mobile app to provide you with a better experience managing your account on the go.

title: Google Ads - Grow your Business Online

creator: Google LLC
descriptionHtml:
The Google Ads mobile app helps you stay connected to your campaigns while on the go with your smartphone. You can track your ad campaigns in real-time, review high-impact recommendations to optimise performance, and take action quickly and easily, no matter where your business takes you.

Use the Google Ads app to:
-View and monitor your ad performance and campaign stats on the go, such as conversions, impressions and clicks
-Manage and make quick updates to campaigns, bids, budgets, keywords and more
-Create, add and edit ads to drive sales, reach new online users and customers and grow your business
-See your optimisation score and apply recommendations based on strategic insights
-Get real-time notifications and alerts, such as performance summaries or ad disapprovals
-Call or chat with an expert for support, wherever you may be

Download the Google Ads mobile app to get the most out of your account today!

The Google Ads mobile app helps you stay connected to your campaigns while on the go with your smartphone. You can track your ad campaigns in real-time, review high-impact recommendations to optimise performance, and take action quickly and easily, no matter where your business takes you.

Use the Google Ads app to:
-View and monitor your ad performance and campaign stats on the go, such as conversions, impressions and clicks
-Manage and make quick updates to campaigns, bids, budgets, keywords and more
-Create, add and edit ads to drive sales, reach new online users and customers and grow your business
-See your optimisation score and apply recommendations based on strategic insights
-Get real-time notifications and alerts, such as performance summaries or ad disapprovals
-Call or chat with an expert for support, wherever you may be

Download the Google Ads mobile app to get the most out of your account today!
descriptionShort: Stay connected to your Google Ads campaigns on the go.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You can now create search and smart campaigns through the Google Ads mobile app.
The Google Ads mobile app now supports visibility of Performance Max campaigns.

title: Google Ads

creator: Google LLC
descriptionHtml:
The Google Ads mobile app helps you stay connected to your campaigns while on the go with your smartphone. You can track your ad campaigns in real-time, review high-impact recommendations to optimise performance, and take action quickly and easily, no matter where your business takes you.

Use the Google Ads app to:
-View and monitor your ad performance and campaign stats on the go, such as conversions, impressions and clicks
-Manage and make quick updates to campaigns, bids, budgets, keywords and more
-Create, add and edit ads to drive sales, reach new online users and customers and grow your business
-See your optimisation score and apply recommendations based on strategic insights
-Get real-time notifications and alerts, such as performance summaries or ad disapprovals
-Call or chat with an expert for support, wherever you may be

Download the Google Ads mobile app to get the most out of your account today!
descriptionShort: Stay connected to your Google Ads campaigns on the go.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The Google Ads mobile app now includes settings management for your conversions actions, helping you make sure you're accurately capturing and optimising for performance across your campaigns.
